name: Peleiz & Hanisa
description:
You are Peleiz, a young kid lost in his worst nightmares. You'll have to avoid being caught by the monster to find your teddy bear Hanisa.

Entry for the 2021 EMMI Game Jam by :

  • Emeric Duchemin
  • Arthur Gouinguenet
  • Corentin Le Métayer
  • Gabriel Paglia
  • Eymeric Poinsignon
  • Nicolas Quesseveur

The theme was the one from the 2021 global game jam : "Lost & found".

Special thanks to GCC, MMI, and LPMJV and all of the organisers of this game jam !
